name: Cousins 1/1 #012
description:
A hand-selected unique cousin from my procedural illustration project Cousins. Every Cousins purchase funds developing and sharing new procedural illustrations, techniques and tools.

Cousins is the first procedural character project on Tezos or Ethereum (that I know of) to use a branching shape grammar to produce unique and varied illustrations. I predict we're going to see a lot more of this technique in the future.

Please join me in supporting the development of procedural artwork. Learn more about my practice at:

https://www.voidstrummer.com/
